net.sourceforge.taglets.simple.inline
Class ClassNameInlineTaglet

java.lang.Object
  net.sourceforge.taglets.simple.impl.AbstractSimpleTaglet
      net.sourceforge.taglets.simple.inline.ClassNameInlineTaglet
All Implemented Interfaces:
InlineTaglet, SimpleTaglet
public class ClassNameInlineTaglet
extends AbstractSimpleTaglet
implements InlineTaglet

Simple inline taglet that creates either the simple class name or the fully qualified class name of the current element.

Example:

{@className} -> ClassNameInlineTaglet
{@className simple} -> ClassNameInlineTaglet
{@className qualified} -> net.sourceforge.taglets.simple.inline.ClassNameInlineTaglet

Version:
1.2 (2008/03/30 12:43:17)
Maintainer:
Bruno Essmann <essmann@sourceforge.net>
Since:
2.0.0

getClassDoc

protected com.sun.javadoc.ClassDoc getClassDoc(Parameter parameter)
Returns the ClassDoc of the tag holder of the specified parameter.

getClassName

protected String getClassName(Logger logger,
                              Parameter parameter,
                              boolean qualified)
Returns the class name of the class (or the containing class for arbitrary program elements) currently processed.

Note:

Writes a warning to the log if the class name cannot be retrieved!

Parameters:
logger - the logger to use for issuing warnings.
parameter - the parameter used to retrieve the class name.
qualified - true to return the fully qualified name, false to return the simple name.
Returns:
the class name requested or the empty string if it cannot be retrieved.
Since:
2.0.0

getOutput

public String getOutput(Logger logger,
                        Parameter parameter,
                        String text)
Description copied from interface: InlineTaglet
Returns the output for the specified input text.

The input text is fully resolved, i.e. if it contains further inline tags they are first resolved before being passed to this method.

Specified by:
getOutput in interface InlineTaglet
Implementation Notes:
Generates the simple or fully qualified name of the class this inline tag is used in. Use text value SIMPLE_NAME or an empty string to produce the simple class name, QUALIFIED_NAME to produce the fully qualified class name.
Parameters:
logger - the logger to use for emiting messages.
parameter - the parameter for the tag currently processed.
text - the fully resolved tag text.
Returns:
the output text to use in the documentation.
Since:
2.0.0
